name: The Last Fish
description:
The Last Fish.
Ludum Dare 37 is under way and your owner is working hard on his game. As your owner over indulges, and his work continues to consume his life, he starts to forget to feed you. Fight for your survival, eat to live, be the last fish.

Controls:
Use Mouse left-click to move fish/eat

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=64882
